Summary: Object appeared very bright and glowing in the western sky moved over the treetops slowly and crossed over the house before ascending quickly on a diagonal. It disappeared in the sky near the star deneb and before disappearing appeared to turn red.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Norton
There were no other sightings in Norton on or around August 12th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsObject appeared very bright white light in the western sky. It moved over the treetops slowly. Large white glow. It moved over where we were standing and began a quick ascent NE toward the area of the sky where Deneb is visible. The color changed to red shortly before it left sight. The shape appeared spherical and there was total silence from the time we saw it until it disappeared. The sky was mostly clear.
